00007 // Constructor
00008 ServiceRepositoryListener::ServiceRepositoryListener()
00009 {
00010     FilterForMonitoring = (ServiceFilter *)NULL;
00011 }
00012 
00013 // virtual destructor
00014 ServiceRepositoryListener::~ServiceRepositoryListener()
00015 {
00016     // Strop browsing
00017     StopBrowse();
00018 
00019     // We do not delete anymore ServiceFilter
00020     // Delete filter if any !
00021     // if ( FilterForMonitoring != (ServiceFilter *)NULL )
00022     // {
00023     //  delete FilterForMonitoring;
00024     // }
00025 
00026     // Remove id (unsigned intergers)
00027     MonitoredServicesForRemovals.Empty();
00028 }
00029 
00030 bool ServiceRepositoryListener::SetFilter( ServiceFilter * Filter )
00031 {
00032     if ( FilterForMonitoring != (ServiceFilter *)NULL )
00033     {
00034         return false;
00035     }
00036     FilterForMonitoring = Filter;
00037     return true;
00038 }
00039 
00040 bool ServiceRepositoryListener::UnsetFilter()
00041 {
00042     if ( FilterForMonitoring == (ServiceFilter *)NULL )
00043     {
00044         return false;
00045     }
00046     delete FilterForMonitoring;
00047     FilterForMonitoring = (ServiceFilter *)NULL;
00048     return true;
00049 }
00050 
00051 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE ServiceRepositoryListener::DnsSdProxyServiceBrowseReply( unsigned int flags, const DnsSdService& ServiceInfo )
00052 {
00053     if ( flags & OmiscidDNSServiceFlagsAdd )
00054     {
00055         // A new service appear
00056         // AS this *ù## gcc do not want to create a reference on "on the fly" constructed objects
00057         // construct it first
00058         ServiceProxy LocalSP( ComTools::GeneratePeerId(), ServiceInfo.HostName, ServiceInfo.Port, (ServiceProperties &)ServiceInfo.Properties );
00059 
00060         // If no filter or if the service is valid for this filter
00061         if ( FilterForMonitoring == (ServiceFilter *)NULL || FilterForMonitoring->IsAGoodService( LocalSP ) == true )
00062         {
00063             // Add this peerId to the list of Monitored Service
00064             MonitoredServicesForRemovals.Add(LocalSP.GetPeerId());
00065 
00066             // Send notification
00067             ServiceAdded( LocalSP );
00068         }
00069     }
00070     else
00071     {
00072         // A service disappear
00073         // AS this *ù## gcc do not want to create a reference on "on the fly" constructed objects
00074         // construct it first
00075         ServiceProxy LocalSP( ComTools::GeneratePeerId(), ServiceInfo.HostName, ServiceInfo.Port, (ServiceProperties &)ServiceInfo.Properties );
00076         unsigned int lpeerId = LocalSP.GetPeerId();
00077 
00078         // Serach th peerId, if monitored, then notify
00079         for( MonitoredServicesForRemovals.First(); MonitoredServicesForRemovals.NotAtEnd(); MonitoredServicesForRemovals.Next() )
00080         {
00081             if ( MonitoredServicesForRemovals.GetCurrent() == lpeerId )
00082             {
00083                 MonitoredServicesForRemovals.RemoveCurrent();
00084                 ServiceRemoved( LocalSP );
00085                 break;
00086             }
00087         }
00088     }
00089 }
